title: Hospital Management System
description: This project, built with advanced Java and SQL, offers a healthcare management system where admins, doctors, and patients can access and manage tailored functionalities and data.

title: Bus Booking System
description: This project, built with core Java and MySQL, allows users to book tickets and download them as PDFs, offering a convenient and efficient ticket management solution.

title: Weather API
description: This project, built with JavaScript, provides real-time weather status globally, allowing users to check current conditions and forecasts from anywhere in the world.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: This project, developed with JavaScript, offers an interactive Tic-Tac-Toe game, allowing players to enjoy and compete in the classic game directly through their web browser.
